Question: This person spent $36 million for her reelection, more than any other candidate for Senate in the 2006 elections did.
Hints: This person and Obama each received over 17 million votes during the nomination process, with both breaking the previous record.
In late November 2010, this person led the U.S.
This person traveled to 79 countries during this time, breaking the mark for most-traveled First Lady held by Pat Nixon.
